```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
libs <- c("htmltools", "webutils", "typed")
lapply(libs, library, character.only = TRUE)
df <- data.frame(x = 1:50,
                 uvcharts = runif(50, 10, 16),
                 chartist = runif(50, 13, 16),
                 rodham = runif(50, 15, 17))
library(dplyr)

library(uvcharts)
uvplot <- df %>%
  uv_stackarea(x) %>%
  uv_add(uvcharts) %>%
  uv_add(chartist) %>%
  uv_add(rodham) %>%
  uv_graph(orientation = "Vertical", bgcolor = "none") %>%
  uv_axis(ticks = 10, fontsize = 9, strokecolor = "#d3d3d3") %>%
  uv_label(fontsize = 5) %>%
  uv_config(legend = list(showlegends = TRUE)) %>%
  uv_margin(20, 20, 30, 70) %>%
  uv_legend(position = "right") %>% 
  uv_frame(bgcolor = "none")

library(chartist)

chartistplot <- mtcars %>%
  mutate(id = 1:n()) %>%
  chart_ist(id, height = 400) %>%
  add_ist(mpg, name = "mpg") %>%
  add_ist(wt, name = "wt") %>%
  add_ist(qsec, name = "qsec") %>%
  lineopt_ist(name = "qsec", lineSmoothing = "step", showPoint = FALSE) %>%
  lineopt_ist(name = "wt", showLine = TRUE, showPoint = TRUE, lineSmoothing = 3) %>%
  lineopt_ist(name = "mpg", showArea = TRUE, showPoint = FALSE) %>%
  xaxis_ist(showGrid = FALSE, showLabel = FALSE) %>%
  yaxis_ist(showGrid = FALSE, showLabel = FALSE) %>%
  lanim_ist() %>%
  sanim_ist() %>%
  loop_ist(6000)

library(graphTweets)
tweets <- data.frame(text = c("tweets @you about @her", "tweet @him about @you", "tweets @her and @I"),
                     source = c("he", "I", "Someone"),
                     stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
edges <- getEdges(tweets, "text", "source")
nodes <- getNodes(edges)
g <- igraph::graph.data.frame(edges, vertices = nodes)
wc <- igraph::cluster_walktrap(g)
members <- igraph::membership(wc)
n3 <- networkD3::igraph_to_networkD3(g, group = members)

n3p <- networkD3::forceNetwork(Links = n3$links, Nodes = n3$nodes,
             Source = 'source', Target = 'target', NodeID = 'name',
             Group = 'group', height = 200, width = 200)
```
